text: The Shaanxi KJ-200 is a Chinese military aircraft. It is designed to be an Airborne Warning and Control System (AWACS) aircraft. It is a modification of the Y-8 transport aircraft. There are 3 examples in service in China. == Similar aircrafts == * Grumman E-2 Hawkeye * SAAB S-100 == References == Category:Chinese military aircraft
title: Shaanxi KJ-200
